A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually breathtaking but lacking in what has made Star Wars such a beloved franchise; the more I think about it\, the worse it gets. An incredibly uninspired and disappointing affair.\nEDIT: I've now had 4 days to think more thoroughly about this movie and it pains me to say this but...Star Wars: The Last Jedi is an abomination.
